articles.title: Google adds AI features to Chromebook Plus devices - TechCrunch
articles.description: Google's adding a slew of AI features to the Chromebook Plus line, including a search and text capture tool, NotebookLM, and a tool for simplifying text.
articles.content: Google’s adding a slew of AI features to its productivity-focused Chromebook Plus line of devices, including a screen-selection tool for search and text capture, a tool that explains complex text, an… [+1475 chars]
